task.title: How to add numbers
task.shortdesc: Continue reading below to learn how to use the Numbers app to add two numbers.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully add numbers, you must know the basics of mathematical operations.

context.p: Follow the steps below to find the sum of two numbers:

taskbody.result: The result of the addition is displayed.

example.p: Lets say you want to find the sum of 6 and 2. To do so, the mathematical operation will look like this: 6+2=8. Using the app, enter 6 followed by the plus button. Next, enter 2. Press the equals button.
The result "8" is displayed on the screen.
